attributes.title: Reality Of The Universe Is Consciousness || 06 January 2021
attributes.description:
5-6 JANUARY 2021, TUESDAY (IST) PAST MIDNIGHT (SO ESSENTIALLY 6 JAN 2021)

*SHAKTI PADA AND SHAKTINI PADA WITH THE LIVE DARSHAN OF SPH, JGM, HDH BHAGAVAN NITHYANANDA PARAMASHIVAM ON THE AUSPICIOUS OCCASION OF THE 8TH DAY OF THE ONGOING 21-DAY ‘NITHYANANDOTSAVA’, THE 44TH AVATARA DINA DINOTSAVA (BIRTHDAY) CELEBRATIONS OF SPH, JGM, HDH BHAGAVAN NITHYANANDA PARAMASHIVAM. 

*THE SUPREME PONTIFF OF HINDUISM BLESSES THE POORNAHUTI OF MAHAKALABHAIRAVA BHAIRAVA HOMA HAPPENING LIVE FROM ADIKAILASA SARVAJNAPEETHAM, BENGALURU AADHEENAM, INDIA  ON THIS AUSPICIOUS OCCASION AND CELEBRATIONS

*TODAY ON THE EIGHTH DAY OF THE SRI NITHYANANDOTSAVAM, THE 44TH AVATHARA DINOTSAVA CELEBRATIONS, WE ARE CELEBRATING THE REVIVAL OF SHAIVISM BY THE SUPREME PONTIFF OF HINDUISM, JAGATGURU MAHASANNIDHANAM, HIS DIVINE HOLINESS BHAGAVAN NITHYANANDA PARAMASHIVAM. 

*TODAY IN THE NITHYANANDESHWARA PARAMASHIVA DEVASTHANAM, THE SPH’S UTSAVA VIGRAHA IS GRACING IN THE KALABHAIRAVA SWAMI ALANKARAM. KALABHAIRAVA IS ONE OF THE POWERFUL MANIFESTATIONS OF PARAMASHIVA, HE MANIFESTED POWERFULLY TO REMOVE THE FALSE IDENTITY OF  BRAHMA AND BLESSED HIM WITH THE EXPERIENCE OF PARAMASHIVOHAM.

*KALABHAIRAVA IS THE LORD OF TIME AND SPACE.  AS THE LORD OF TIME AND INTEGRITY, KALABHAIRAVA HOLDS THE KEY TO COSMIC ARCHIVES - THE AKASHIC RECORDS WHICH CONTAIN THE PAST, PRESENT AND FUTURE. KALABHAIRAVA IS THE SOURCE OF CAUSAL BODY, THE SOURCE FROM WHICH REJUVENATION FOR MANIFESTATION HAPPENS. 

*WITH GREAT PRIDE AND PRIVILEGE WE ARE SUPREMELY EAGER AND GRATEFUL THAT THE SUPREME PONTIFF OF HINDUISM IS OFFICIATING THIS GRAND KALABHAIRAVA MANTRA SAMPUTITA NITHYANANDA HOMA, HERE IN THE SRI NITHYANANDESHWARA PARAMASHIVA DEVASTHANAM, IN ADIKAILAASA NITHYANANDA PEETHAM. 

*BEING THE 1008TH LIVING INCARNATION OF PARAMASHIVA, SWAMIJI IS THE VERY EMBODIMENT OF KALABHAIRAVA BRINGING TREMENDOUS PROTECTION, INTEGRITY AND COMPLETION TO THE WHOLE COSMOS. 

*THE RITUALS AND HOMA CONDUCTED IN ADI KAILASA ARE MICROMANAGED PERSONALLY BY THE SUPREME PONTIFF OF HINDUISM KEEPING TRUE TO THE INSTRUCTIONS AS PER VEDAS AND AGAMAS. FURTHER, THE RITUALS ARE CONDUCTED BY THIRD EYE AWAKENED DISCIPLES OF THE SPH. THEREFORE, WITH THE BLESSINGS, PRESENCE AND GRACE OF THE SPH, KALABHAIRAVA MANIFESTS INTENSELY, PROTECTS AND BLESSES ALL SINCERE PRAYERS OF ONE AND ALL. 

*LET US NOW OFFER OUR GRATITUDE AND WORSHIP TO SWAMIJI GRACING AS KALABHAIRAVA SWAMI ALONG WITH ANANDA GANAPATI AND VALLI DEVASENA SAMETHA SRI SUBRAHMANYA SWAMI.

*MAHAKALABHAIRAVA - I - AM HERE. 
*BLESSINGS TO ALL OF YOU. 
*I AM HERE, VERILY AVAILABLE TO ACCEPT THE PURNAHUTI, WORSHIP AND PUJA AND BLESS YOU ALL, LIBERATE ALL OF YOU FROM ALL THE KARMAS.

*PARAMASHIVA’S MESSAGE DIRECTLY FROM KAILASA:

*PARAMASHIVA IS HERE. 
*LISTEN WITH SHRADDHA. 
*’TIME’ IS MY SKIN ON WHICH THE STIMULUS SIGNALS CALLED THIS UNIVERSE MANIFEST. 
*UNIVERSE AS YOU SEE IS ONLY THE SIGNALS MANIFESTING ON MY SKIN. IT IS NOT REAL. 
*MY NARRATION OF THE EXISTENCE, YOUR DELUSION OF THE UNIVERSE, BOTH MEET EACH OTHER ON MY SKIN CALLED TIME - KALA. 
*MY NARRATION, MY REALITY, MY EXISTENCE IS STORED IN TIME - KALA - AS AKASHIC RECORD. 
*I RUN THIS COSMOS THROUGH DHARMA.
*MY NARRATION OF THE COSMOS IS JNANA.
*MY NARRATION OF THIS UNIVERSE IS KNOWLEDGE.
*MY WILL TO RUN THIS UNIVERSE IS PARAMESHWARA
*O HUMAN BEINGS! LISTEN! YOUR DELUDED NARRATIVES ARE INSTIGATED BY THE SIGNALS YOU PERCEIVE WHICH IS NEITHER PERMANENT NOR ETERNAL OR LEADS YOU TO THE ULTIMATE STATE.
*LISTEN INTENSELY!
*DON’T BE DELUDED BY THE SIGNALS YOU EXPERIENCE INSIDE YOUR EXISTENCE.
*DON’T BE DELUDED BY THE COLLECTIVE NARRATIVES YOU ALL CREATE.
*DON'T BE DELUDED AND DILUTED BY MORE AND MORE DELUDED NARRATIONS OF YOURSELF, UNIVERSE, LIFE.
*LIVE ON THE REALITY, TRUTH OF THE AKASHIC RECORDS - VEDAAGAMAS
*LET THE UNIVERSE REVEAL ITS GRAND NARRATIVE IN THE FORM OF VEDAAGAMAS TO RAISE THE QUALITY OF YOUR EXISTENCE, TO GIVE YOU ALL SUPERCONSCIOUS BREAKTHROUGH.
*KALA - TIME, IS MY SKIN ON WHICH THESE SIGNALS RAISE. 
*THE SIGNALS YOU PERCEIVE IS NOT THE REALITY OF THE UNIVERSE,
*REALITY OF THE UNIVERSE IS CONSCIOUSNESS.





Get Your Free E-Passport at join.kailaasa.org and receive all the gifts to live enlightenment!
